lines.text: No one can walk on foot to America.
No, not on any conditions... America is an island.
There are two kinds of people in America. First, those who have lived here long and become rich. And then there's those who are newly arrived and haven't yet become rich.
If we refrained, I mean, then there won't be any more children.
Refrain? For the rest of our lives? Would we keep ourselves from each other for all our days? I would never be able to, Kristina. Not until I'm so old that spruce moss begins to grow in my beard.
Karl Oskar, I have to tell you something. I'm that way yet again.
Oh? It couldn't have been any more untimely and unsuited.
No one is allowed to give communion unless they are ordained.
As far as I know, nowhere in the Bible does it say that Our Lord Jesus was ordained.
Karl Oskar, I have to tell you something. I'm in that condition again.
Oh? It couldn't have come at a worse time.
So I can't get pregnant so it fits for you? It's your fault I'm this way too, yours more than mine! You're the one who comes at a bad time!
I am so tired, Karl Oskar... I cannot bear anymore.
